name: Hubtype
description: Hubtype helps global brands transition from traditional communication channels to messaging apps by building, designing and scaling conversations through conversational apps.   We help your developers build conversational apps in a language they love to use and save them the trouble of spending months developing new tools from scratch. Having ready-made tools allows your team to quickly develop product-ready conversational experiences and launch within a couple of weeks.  Built for developers and designed for enterprise-level service, Hubtype is the leading developer platform for building conversational apps, combining meaningful automation with human handoff. We provide the full set of tools required to build UX-focused conversational experiences on messaging apps.  Build meaningful multichannel conversational experiences with react and at scale.
